mapper.insert: insert into movie(moviename, photo, type, duration, introduction, release_date,score,author,production) values (#{moviename},#{photo},#{type},#{duration},#{introduction},#{release_date},#{score},#{author});
mapper.select: select moviename, photo, type, duration, introduction, release_date as releaseDate,score,author,production from movie where moviename=#{moviename};
